text: Ci ʙadiest, ki ʙani Isroil ʙaroi xud onro ixtijor namudand; (ja'ne, kufrro ʙa çoi imon ʙarguzidand.) Va in raftor az saʙaʙi zulmu hasadi onon ʙud, zero Alloh az fazlu karami xeş ʙa kadom ʙandae , ki ixtijor kunad, Qur'onro nozil mekunad. Va ʙa saʙaʙi munkir şudanaşon ʙa Pajomʙari oxiri zamon Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) va ʙa saʙaʙi taƣjirdodanaşon kitoʙi Tavrotro, xaşme ʙoloi xaşm ovardand. Va kofironro azoʙest xorkunanda
